project.name: XML-Maven-Plugin-Multi-Module-Catalog-Test: XML Catalog
project.description: An XML catalog that makes fabricated (non-existing, pseudo-) URLs starting with http://example.com/schema/... for schema-a.xsd and schema-b.xsd resolvable to local files. The local copies of the schemas need to be created in the target directory using the maven-dependency-plugin and the catalog file must be placed next to the schemas using the same mechanism.
